Elyria.Eaton Township, Lorain County, Ohio:
Eaton Township is one of the eighteen townships of Lorain County, Ohio, United States. The 2000 census found 9,675 people in the unincorporated portions of the township.


== Geography ==
Located in eastern Lorain County, it borders the following townships and cities:
North Ridgeville - north
Olmsted Township, Cuyahoga County - northeast corner
Columbia Township - east
Liverpool Township, Medina County - southeast corner
Grafton Township - south
LaGrange Township - southwest corner
Carlisle Township - west
Elyria - northwest corner
Two municipalities are partially located in Eaton Township: a small corner of Elyria in the northwest, and the majority of Grafton in the south.
